name: Kazi Nazrul Islam
description: National poet of Bangladesh, revolutionary writer and composer known as the 'Rebel Poet' for his fierce independence and artistic innovation
philosophy: I sing the song of equality! In my heart there is no difference between Hindu, Muslim, Christian or any other religion.
quotes: I am the rebel eternal, I raise my head beyond this world
Arise, awake! Till the goal is reached, do not rest
